Bio

I'm an experienced sales representative turned web developer. With ten years of experience in tech and startups, and experience building a startup from the ground up, I took it upon myself to learn new skills in web development. Professional skills include: Javascript, Node.js, React.js, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL; hands-on experience with managing a small team, entrepreneurship, business development, fundraising, B2B/B2C sales, boostrapping, general management, project management, SaaS and startups.
